value:
$WmMPID_比翼エリーゼ_v7.2,ch05_25_Elise_FF_Pair,Face|Almost there! How many more
gifts are there to deliver?$k$p$nMPID_サクラ|Just one, actually—the present
for $Nu.$k$p$nMPID_比翼エリーゼ_v7.2|We may only have one more, but...
we won't be done anytime soon.$k$pTake a look at that line of people.
It snakes out the door!$k$p$nMPID_サクラ|Oh my! Are those all Heroes?
What are they all doing here?$k$p$nMPID_比翼エリーゼ_v7.2|The same thing as us, apparently.
Everyone wants to deliver a gift
to $Nu!$k$p$nMPID_サクラ|I can't say I'm surprised!$k$p$nMPID_比翼エリーゼ_v7.2|And since they get to deliver it
face-to-face, people tend to drag
out their time as much as possible.$k$pJust look at how slow the line
is moving. At this rate, we'll be
waiting around for hours...$k$pOh, I know what we'll do!$k$p$nMPID_サクラ|What's the plan?$k$p$nMPID_比翼エリーゼ_v7.2|If we're not going to reach the
front of the line anytime soon...$k$pThen why don't we spend our time
making a gift with a personal touch
to give to $Nu?$k$pCome here, so no one can listen in...
First we can...*whisper* *whisper*
and then we'll...*whisper* *whisper*$k$p$nMPID_サクラ|That's a great idea!$k$pBut won't we need to get a lot
of equipment from around the
castle, though?$k$p$nMPID_比翼エリーゼ_v7.2|We will, and we'll need to get enough
that we have some to practice on too.
There's no time to lose! Come on!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_愛の祭レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Valentine23,Face|Elise? The festival grounds are in the
other direction. Where are you going?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エリーゼ_v7.2,ch05_25_Elise_FF_Pair,Face|Oh, Brother! I forgot something at
the castle and need to go back for
it—that's all. You can go on ahead!$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Valentine23,Face|That shifty look of yours says you're
up to something. Just what is it
you're scheming now?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼エリーゼ_v7.2,ch05_25_Elise_FF_Pair,Face|What?! Me? I wouldn't— Innocent me?
I could never!$k$p$nMPID_サクラ|W-we're princesses, after all,
Prince Leo!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_比翼エリーゼ_v7.2,ch05_25_Elise_FF_Pair,Face|Oh, look! I think I see Corrin coming!
And with a whole armful of tomatoes!$k$pMmm... They look tasty, don't they,
Brother? Corrin is so thoughtful...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Valentine23,Face|Tomatoes?! ...Where? Hm. I don't
see Corr—$k$pOh... They've run off. The schemers.$k$p$Sbs150|
